term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: Prohibits an individual who has a pending charge or has been convicted of a crime (other than a minor traffic offense) from serving as an enumerator for the collection of census data. Exempts any individual who holds an enumerator position as of the date of this Act's enactment.
